quest.name: Talos, Interrupted
journal:
 Quest Sync
Eueliss appears ready to accept Sai-Lewq's next task.

Eueliss asks Sai-Lewq for his second task─a duty which apparently involves a slow-footed Talos. Follow her lead, and help free the Talos in question from any bothersome predators.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
You have inspected the derelict Talos, and dealt with the pests which infested its interior. Eueliss waits nearby with a look of resignation...

Eueliss briefly explains the decline of Talos in the region, and how the rusted specimen you inspected─a favorite of Sai-Lewq's─was damaged to the point where it would never move again. With nothing more to be done, you turn back towards Stonegazer.

Sai-Lewq appears well pleased by your actions in aiding his dear Talos. Eueliss, too, thanks you for your assistance, and hopes that you will stay to help with whatever other confounding errands the old man has in store.
objectives: Inspect the derelict Talos and defeat any threats that appear.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: I am grateful to have you with me, Forename. Thank you again...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Sai-Lewq, sir, I believe you had more tasks for me?

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Hm? Still here, are you? Yes, yes, tasks...

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: There's a Talos of mine that's taking far too long to make its return. Probably busy tussling with some dim-witted predator. Go and see how it fares, and chase off anything slowing it down.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: But, all the─ Ah, you mean that Talos...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Pray follow my lead, Forename.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: We'll find the Talos in question to the southwest of here. And I've no doubt there'll be “dim-witted predators” aplenty for you to deal with.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: <sigh>

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Something hostile emerges from the Talos!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Here's the Talos Sai-Lewq was talking about. I think something's made a nest in there...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Phew, I'm glad you were here! They must have burrowed in beneath the plates.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: I know Sai-Lewq implied the Talos was still moving, but as you can see...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Once upon a time there'd be a line of these contraptions hauling materials down to the shipyard, step by ponderous step. Which incidentally, is how the “Slowroad” supposedly earned its name.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: But after Daedalus Stoneworks closed down some fifteen summers ago, there was no one left to make or maintain their creations. One by one, the Talos slowly fell into disrepair...

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: This particular worker was damaged during that stray eater rampage, and it hasn't shifted an ilm ever since. It was always Sai-Lewq's favorite.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: ...Come, let us make our report.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Sai-Lewq, sir, Forename has cleared away the pests who were bothering your Talos.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: It should be left alone for the time being...

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Ah, excellent news! But I expect he'll need a good polishing when he returns─the most troublesome ones are often the most endearing, eh?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Oh, sir...

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: You've done me a fine service, thank you!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Indeed, thank you, Forename─I never could have fought such creatures myself. If I might impose upon you for the next task as well...?

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: If only... If only I had... <sniff>
